definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole

sentences.english: She was a pathetic figure as she stepped out of the cab with the baby in her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她抱着孩子從馬車上下來，一付哀婉動人的樣子。

sentences.english: As she sat in church her face had a pathos and poignancy.
sentences.chinese: 當她坐在教堂裏時，臉上帶着一種哀婉和辛辣的表情。

sentences.english: Only it can resist everything in the lamentation of years.
sentences.chinese: 在歲月哀婉的歌聲中，只有它才能與一切對抗。

sentences.english: It is a sad love story.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個哀婉的愛情故事。

sentences.english: Is a whole chapter echoes the tone of deep but subtle language.
sentences.chinese: 是迴盪全篇的低沉而又哀婉的調子。

sentences.english: There is abundant pathos in her words.
Fado music, a type of mournful singing, relates to saudade.
sentences.chinese: 法多音樂就是與它相關的一種哀婉樂。

definition: lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
doleful/piteous/also written 淒婉|凄婉[qi1 wan3]
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
